item.title: Dicing in Chat
item.dc:creator: @eighteenmilla eighteenmilla
item.description:
@eighteenmilla wrote:

i did that and i still get errors in the compiler i made sure i had the packaging right it turned out to be the same as yours but it still gave me errors this is what i had

if(playerCommand.startsWith(“roll”)){
int random = Misc.random(100);
c.forcedChat("{" + c.properName + “} Rolled " + random + " On The Percentile Die”);
c.startAnimation(827);
server.clanChat.messageToClan("{" + c.properName + “} Rolled " + random + " On The Percentile Die”, clanId);
